Proclamations. 1587-12-16

titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation for waightes published by the Queenes Maiesties commaundement
Proclamations. 1587-12-16
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.

Sheets 1 and 2 are in 2 settings; sheet 3 is in 3 impositions. In this copy: sheet 1, line 1 of text ends "and"; sheet 2, line 1 has "waightes"; sheet 3, 4th line below crown has "LVI. pound A." and the "P" of "Printer" in the imprint is below the "L" of "London".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
